personalInfo.name: Sarah Chen
personalInfo.summary: Full-stack software engineer with 6+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams. Passionate about clean code, developer experience, and mentoring junior engineers. Strong background in React, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure.

workExperience.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Led development of a real-time collaboration platform serving 50,000+ daily active users
Architected microservices migration reducing system latency by 40% and improving deployment frequency by 3x
Mentored team of 4 junior engineers, conducting code reviews and establishing coding standards
Implemented comprehensive test automation increasing code coverage from 45% to 85%

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Built React-based dashboard enabling customers to manage $10M+ in monthly transactions
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs handling 100K+ requests per day with 99.9% uptime
Collaborated with product team to define technical requirements and deliver features on schedule
Introduced CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

workExperience.title: Junior Developer
highlights: Developed responsive websites for 20+ clients using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Created WordPress themes and plugins customized to client specifications
Participated in client meetings to gather requirements and present technical solutions
Member of Women in Computer Science organization

projects.name: DevMetrics Dashboard
projects.description: Open-source developer productivity dashboard that aggregates metrics from GitHub, Jira, and CI/CD pipelines
highlights: 500+ GitHub stars and used by 50+ development teams
Implemented real-time data sync with WebSocket connections
Created comprehensive documentation and contribution guidelines

projects.name: TaskFlow CLI
projects.description: Command-line task management tool with Git-like workflow for developers
highlights: Published on Homebrew with 200+ monthly active users
